scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --public-url https://dbsbank.design --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml
scripts.build:win: rm -rf dist && mkdir .\dist && set NODE_ENV=production && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --public-url https://dbsbank.design --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml
